categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Neet Alamant was a male Human who served as a recruiter for Civilian Adjunct to the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 BBY, Alamant recruited Twi'lek Memah Roothes on Imperial Center as part of a drive to acquire personnel for the Death Star's complement. He offered her the position of bartender at a cantina on the station.
